svg.title: Text area scroller - buffered rendering unspecified

textArea.tspan: Why did you bring us here? We're rescuing ya. Ooh, name it after me! Yeah, I do that with my stupidness. You wouldn't. Ask anyway!

Isn't it true that you have been paid for your testimony? Goodbye, friends. I never thought I'd die like this. But I always really hoped. Interesting. No, wait, the other thing: tedious. You know, I was God once. That's right, baby. I ain't your loverboy Flexo, the guy you love so much. You even love anyone pretending to be him! And then the battle's not so bad?

You can see how I lived before I met you. Well, let's just dump it in the sewer and say we delivered it. I usually try to keep my sadness pent up inside where it can fester quietly as a mental illness. I feel like I was mauled by Jesus. You lived before you met me?!

Fry, we have a crate to deliver. I didn't ask for a completely reasonable excuse! I asked you to get busy! I was having the most wonderful dream. Except you were there, and you were there, and you were there! No! The cat shelter's on to me. No! I want to live! There are still too many things I don't own! Say it in Russian! Yeah, lots of people did. [soto voce] Pansy. Fetal stemcells, aren't those controversial?
Why would a robot need to drink? So, how 'bout them Knicks? Can I use the gun? Oh yeah, good luck with that. It doesn't look so shiny to me. You guys realize you live in a sewer, right?

No, I'm Santa Claus! [having quickly written a book to trap the Big Brain in] There, now he's trapped in a book I wrote: a crummy world of plot holes and spelling errors! And then the battle's not so bad? Shut up and get to the point!
No! The cat shelter's on to me. Well, let's just dump it in the sewer and say we delivered it. Negative, bossy meat creature!

I love you, buddy! I'll get my kit! Calculon is gonna kill us and it's all everybody else's fault! I wish! It's a nickel. Ah, computer dating. It's like pimping, but you rarely have to use the phrase "upside your head." Oh, how I wish I could believe or understand that! There's only one reasonable course of action now: kill Flexo!
Why would a robot need to drink? So, how 'bout them Knicks? Can I use the gun? Oh yeah, good luck with that. It doesn't look so shiny to me. You guys realize you live in a sewer, right?

No, I'm Santa Claus! [having quickly written a book to trap the Big Brain in] There, now he's trapped in a book I wrote: a crummy world of plot holes and spelling errors! And then the battle's not so bad? Shut up and get to the point!
No! The cat shelter's on to me. Well, let's just dump it in the sewer and say we delivered it. Negative, bossy meat creature!

I love you, buddy! I'll get my kit! Calculon is gonna kill us and it's all everybody else's fault! I wish! It's a nickel. Ah, computer dating. It's like pimping, but you rarely have to use the phrase "upside your head." Oh, how I wish I could believe or understand that! There's only one reasonable course of action now: kill Flexo!
Why would a robot need to drink? So, how 'bout them Knicks? Can I use the gun? Oh yeah, good luck with that. It doesn't look so shiny to me. You guys realize you live in a sewer, right?

No, I'm Santa Claus! [having quickly written a book to trap the Big Brain in] There, now he's trapped in a book I wrote: a crummy world of plot holes and spelling errors! And then the battle's not so bad? Shut up and get to the point!
No! The cat shelter's on to me. Well, let's just dump it in the sewer and say we delivered it. Negative, bossy meat creature!

I love you, buddy! I'll get my kit! Calculon is gonna kill us and it's all everybody else's fault! I wish! It's a nickel. Ah, computer dating. It's like pimping, but you rarely have to use the phrase "upside your head." Oh, how I wish I could believe or understand that! There's only one reasonable course of action now: kill Flexo!
Why would a robot need to drink? So, how 'bout them Knicks? Can I use the gun? Oh yeah, good luck with that. It doesn't look so shiny to me. You guys realize you live in a sewer, right?

No, I'm Santa Claus! [having quickly written a book to trap the Big Brain in] There, now he's trapped in a book I wrote: a crummy world of plot holes and spelling errors! And then the battle's not so bad? Shut up and get to the point!
No! The cat shelter's on to me. Well, let's just dump it in the sewer and say we delivered it. Negative, bossy meat creature!

I love you, buddy! I'll get my kit! Calculon is gonna kill us and it's all everybody else's fault! I wish! It's a nickel. Ah, computer dating. It's like pimping, but you rarely have to use the phrase "upside your head." Oh, how I wish I could believe or understand that! There's only one reasonable course of action now: kill Flexo!
